short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Neon Car Wallpaper turn new tab to custom Neon Cars background. Cool Neon Car wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Neon Cars Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Neon Cars wallpapers with each new tab you open.
2. Enjoy the flexibility to randomize your Neon Cars background or set a favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links for swift access to your emails and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Convenient "New Note" feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Streamlined access to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks for quick retrieval.
9. Ability to add websites to the Shortcut panel for faster navigation.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy navigation to additional themes.
12. Seamless sharing options to social media platforms.
13. Quick links to download wallpapers.
14. Direct access to a variety of games.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks in your Neon Cars new tab.
